title: vElanaik-kaNDa
sahitya:
vElanaik-kaNDa pinnE vEredaiyum en manam vENDAdirukkudaDi 
sakhiyE virumbiDa marukkudaDi sakhiyE virumbiDa marukkudaDi 


anupallavi

  kAlamellAm avanai karudik-karudiyE kAdal vETkai AghudaDi 
sakhiyE kavala mIrip-pOghudaDi sakhiyE kavalai mIrip-pOghudaDi


caraNam    pashiyE eDuppadillai pashikkenru edaiyum pusikkap-piDikkavillai
sakhiyE rucikka muDivadillai sakhiyE rucikka muDivadillai
kAdalan vElavanai kaNDAl allAdu en vEdanai tIrvadAyilla
sakhiyE vEru marundumillai adarkku vEru marundumillai
